title: #1516 The Shutdown of Conversation
itunes:title: #1516 The Shutdown of Conversation
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing their holiday break experiences watching 'The Love Boat' and how it birthed the 'Battle of the Network Stars'. They also take some calls and discuss the early stages of cancel culture, the safety of getting a Covid vaccine while possibly infected and more. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:

SugarBreak.com/ADS, code ADS
Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
Geico.com
